comment.author: 8157803@N06
comment._content: I so love Australiana but find it very sorry that we have to pay such dear prices for high resolution images. $25 for one? I really feel that such material should be for free, refer to www.shorpy.com for example. Even the glass slides I collected and scanned are for all to share. I do thank you though, for maintaining this site. Take care! www.flickr.com/photos/8157803@N06/3355129708/sizes/o/in/s...
